subtitle: decision is made and announced by Anu
enlil and Niners sag now listen to my
words and observe the message that I
transmit to you leave your home build a
boat renounce your possessions and save
your life read Hut pay attention you
have only 7 Days build a boat that can
rotate and survive the flood make sure
the boat is completely covered and that
the sun cannot be seen inside it its
design and measurements are described on
a tablet I will leave it here next to
the wall of the Reed Hut remember you
have 7 Days build the boat and gather
your family and relatives stack up food
and drinking water also take domestic
animals then on the appointed day a
signal will be given I will send an
anunaki as a guide who will be appointed
by me and who knows the waters he will
come to you on that day you must get
into the boat and close the hatch
tightly a crushing flood coming from the
south will devastate the land and all
life the boat will break loose from
